go_data.justification: Histone H3 is involved in DNA replication origin activation through a novel ubiquitin signalling pathway.
Histone H3 is a component of chromatin, which is involved in chromatin unloading of the replicative helicase at the end of replication.
Histone H3 is subject to mono-ubiquitylation of lysine 23 by the ubiquitin ligase UHRF1.
